directions: Whisk mayonnaise, milk, vinegar, sugar, salt, and black pepper together in a medium-large bowl until well combined.
Stir kidney beans, hard-boiled eggs, green bell pepper, and red onion into the mayonnaise mixture. Eat immediately or refrigerate before serving.
ingredients: salt and ground black pepper to taste
4 (8 ounce) cans dark red kidney beans, drained and rinsed
title: Amy's Kidney Bean Salad
